response.overview: A conman and his seductive partner are forced to work for a wild FBI agent, who pushes them into a world of Jersey power-brokers and the Mafia.
response.title: American Hustle

release_dates.note: Enkelte voldsinnslag gjør at denne filmen får 11-årsgrense.
